resources.string: This is a commitment of the Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran to provide every allottee/purchaser of its properties:Efficient, prompt and courteous service with dedication, integrity and fairness.
This is a commitment of the Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran to provide every allottee/purchaser of its properties:Efficient, prompt and courteous service with dedication, integrity and fairness.

ADDRESS 

 General Manager (Information Technology),
 HSVP Office Complex, C - 3, Sector 6,
 Panchkula - INDIA

CONTACT INFO 

 Phone:-

 1800-180-3030

 Days & Timing:- 

Mon-Fri (09:00 A.M to 05:00 P.M)


 @ ✉ Email:- 

 queryhuda@gmail.com
Mobile App Designed & Developed By : HSVP IT Wing.

1. In case it is found at any stage that Parivar Pehchaan Patra and Aadhaar number provided by you is wrong or not yours, the application is liable to be rejected.

 2. As per the Item 35 of Chapter VII of Aadhaar (Targeted delivery of financial and other subsidies, benefits and services) ACT, 2016, if a person enter Aadhaar number of any other person and attempt to impersonate another person, dead or alive, real or imaginary, he/she shall be punishable with imprisonment for a term which may extend to three years and shall also be liable to a fine which may extend to ten thousand rupees. 

3. In case you do not have Aadhaar, you are requested to apply for Aadhaar enrolment at any Aadhaar enrolment centre at the earliest and revisit the portal with your e-Aadhaar details. 

4. Before proceeding to the next step, properly check your Name, DOB and Gender auto-filled by the portal. 

5. If the name is not yours then recheck your Parivar Pehchaan Patra details filled by you. 

6. If the spelling of your Name/ DOB/ Gender/ Caste/ Family Income/ BPL is wrong, then visit the nearest Parivar Pehchaan Patra Enrolment Centre to correct the details and re-visit the portal. 

7. If more than one application is found to be made on-line, your applications are liable to be rejected. 

8. If there is any wrong entry or mis-match of the Aadhar linked Bank-account details, the State Government will not be responsible for mis-credit. 

9. Password length should not be less than 8 and not more than 20 characters. 

10. Password must contain at least one digit [0-9], one upper case [A-Z], one lower case letter [a-z] and one special character such as [@#&*$!]. 

11. Please avoid choosing a password that is generic in nature, guessable or inferable.
Use this url for apply your scholarship- \n https://harchhatravratti.highereduhry.ac.in/UserLogin
1. Student Can apply only in One Scheme except in Haryana State Meritorious Incentives Scheme.
2. Please Check the Scheme Eligibility here before proceeding.
